parser_config: {"globalSettings":[{"name":"ENABLE_CHAR_POS","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否需要添加char tag","en_desc":"need char tag"},{"name":"JSON_IMAGE_BASE64","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否返回图片的base64","en_desc":"Return Base64 of the image"},{"name":"SIZE_UNIT","value":"","default_value":"pt","desc":"输出HTML的style显示单位","en_desc":"Display unit of output HTML"},{"name":"ZOOM_FACTOR","value":"","default_value":4,"desc":"pdf的清晰度控制参数，如果是1，清晰度默认为72，增加该值大小，可以提高清晰度","en_desc":"PDF clarity parameter. Value -1 for dynamic font size of each line"},{"name":"IMAGE_LABELS","value":"","default_value":["stamp","signature","image"],"desc":"layout模型中，图片段落的label","en_desc":"Label of paragraphs in the layout path"},{"name":"MIN_LINE_AREA_RATIO_WITHIN_FIELD","value":"","default_value":0.5,"desc":"行检测区域/图片区域的阈值 如果实际行检测区域/图片区域大于该阈值，那么图片区域将不予保留，反之图片区域和文字区域都会保留","en_desc":"This threshold is based the ratio of line detection area and object detection area when they overlap. If the ratio is greater than the threshold, the object detection area will not be retained. Otherwise, both areas will be retained"},{"name":"MAX_SIDE_SIZE","value":"","default_value":4096,"desc":"最大边可以支持的输入图片，如果输入文件任一边长大于这个值，将会自动调整图片的大小","en_desc":"The maximum side supported for input image. If the length of either side of the input image is greater than this value, the size of the picture will be scaled down to this value"},{"name":"LINE_INTERSECTION_RATIO","value":"","default_value":0.3,"desc":"行检测的bbox和文件布局模型重叠区域的最小比率。如果超过这个比率，那么行就会有相应的文件布局的标签。如果重叠区域小于这个值，那么行就没有任何布局标签","en_desc":"This threshold is based the ratio of line detection area and layout detection area when they overlap. If the ratio is greater than the threshold, the line will be given the label of the layout.  Otherwise, the line will not be given the layout label"},{"name":"CELL_INTERSECTION_RATIO","value":"","default_value":0.9,"desc":"类似于 line_intersection_ratio. 如果行区域和单元格区域重叠比率小于这个值，那么这个行就不会被认为是该单元格内的内容。","en_desc":"This threshold is based the ratio of cell detection area and row detection area when they overlap. If the ratio is greater than the threshold, the cell will be given the label of the row.  Otherwise, the cell will not be given the row label"},{"name":"MIN_LINE_SHAPE_TO_BBOX_RATIO","value":"","default_value":0.7,"desc":"行检测的原始区域和不可检索区域（是一个多边形shapely.Polygon）进行相交操作，这个操作会生成相应line_shape的相交区域，然后parser会找到该相交区域的最小长方形，如果长方形和原始相交的区域的比值大于这个参数的值，那么这个行就会被忽略。","en_desc":"The original area of line detection and the non retrievable area (polygon shape) intersect, which will generate the corresponding line / shape intersecting.  The parser will find the smallest rectangle of the intersecting area. If the ratio of the rectangle to the original intersecting area is greater than the threshold, this line will be ignored."},{"name":"MIN_NONSEARCH_LINE_TO_WHOLE_LINE_RATIO","value":"","default_value":0,"desc":"如果相交的行区域line_shape和原始的行检测区域的比值小于这个比值，那么这个行检测就会被忽略","en_desc":"This threshold is based the ratio of overlapping row area and original line detection area.  If the ratio is lower than this threshold, the line detection will be ignored"},{"name":"MAX_NONSEARCH_LINE_TO_WHOLE_LINE_RATIO","value":"","default_value":1,"desc":"如果相交的行区域line_shape和原始的行检测区域的比值大于这个值，那么将会用整个行检测区域。","en_desc":"This threshold is based the ratio of overlapping row area and original line detection area.  If the ratio is higher than this threshold, the whole row detection area will be kept."},{"name":"USE_ANGLE_CLASSIFICATION","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否使用大角度分类模型","en_desc":"Use large angle classification model"},{"name":"VISUALIZE_INFERENCE_LINES","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否保存行检测的可视化结果","en_desc":"Save visual results of line detection"},{"name":"VISUALIZE_INFERENCE_LAYOUT","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否保存布局检测的可视化结果","en_desc":"Save the visual results of layout detection"},{"name":"VISUALIZE_INFERENCE_TABLES","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否保存表格模型检测的可视化结果","en_desc":"Save visual results of table model detection"},{"name":"LINE_MERGE_SEG","value":"","default_value":false,"desc":"是否合并行内所有的seg,使用第一个seg的attrs","en_desc":"Merge all segments in the row and use the attribute of the first segment"},{"name":"denote","value":true,"default_value":false,"desc":"是否合并段落","en_desc":"Merge paragraphs"},{"name":"DENOTE_PARAGRAPH","value":true,"default_value":false,"desc":"定位段落","en_desc":"Positioning paragraph"},{"name":"ENABLE_SEARCHABLE_TABLE","value":true,"default_value":false,"desc":"表格还原","en_desc":"table"},{"name":"TABLE_THRESHOLD","value":0.6,"default_value":0.6,"desc":"表格单元格系数","en_desc":"table cell rate"}]}
